useCase.name: Login to PacMan Game

successEndConditions.condition: The user successfully enters the username and starts the game.

useCase.trigger: User clicks on the start button.

mainSequence.step: User writes username in the input field.
PacManUser confirms the username validity is true.
User clicks on the start button.
PacManController handles the start button click.
FileReader retrieves scores from the system.
PacManUser is created with username and score.
FileWriter saves the current scores along with the new user's score.
